member.name: T:Atata.TermVerificationTriggerAttribute
member.summary: The base trigger attribute class that can be used in the verification process when the page object is initialized.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH1Attribute
member.summary: Indicates the verification of the content of the <h1> tag when the page object is initialized.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH2Attribute
member.summary: Indicates the verification of the content of the <h2> tag when the page object is initialized.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH3Attribute
member.summary: Indicates the verification of the content of the <h3> tag when the page object is initialized.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH4Attribute
member.summary: Indicates the verification of the content of the <h4> tag when the page object is initialized.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH5Attribute
member.summary: Indicates the verification of the content of the <h5> tag when the page object is initialized.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH6Attribute
member.summary: Indicates the verification of the content of the <h6> tag when the page object is initialized.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyTitleAttribute
member.summary: Indicates the verification of the page title when the page object is initialized.

member.name: T:Atata.Content`2
member.summary: Represents any element containing content.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.H1`1
member.summary: Represents the <h1> heading tag.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.H2`1
member.summary: Represents the <h2> heading tag.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.H3`1
member.summary: Represents the <h3> heading tag.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.H4`1
member.summary: Represents the <h4> heading tag.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.H5`1
member.summary: Represents the <h5> heading tag.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.H6`1
member.summary: Represents the <h6> heading tag.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.Text`1
member.summary: Represents any element containing text content.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.TriggerPriority
member.summary: Specifies the priority of trigger execution.

member.name: T:Atata.TriggerScope
member.summary: Specifies the scope of trigger application.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerScope.Self
member.summary: Indicates that the trigger applies to the class/member declared.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerScope.Children
member.summary: Indicates that the trigger applies to the child control properties.

member.name: T:Atata.TermFormat
member.summary: Specifies the term format.

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.Inherit
member.summary: Uses inherited format or none if missing.

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.None
member.summary: Doesn't apply format.

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.Title
member.summary: Uses title case (e.g. "Some Term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.TitleWithColon
member.summary: Uses title case with colon (':') ending (e.g. "Some Term:").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.Sentence
member.summary: Uses sentence case (e.g. "Some term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.SentenceLower
member.summary: Uses sentence case starting with first letter in lower case (e.g. "some term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.SentenceWithColon
member.summary: Uses sententce case with colon (':') ending (e.g. "Some term:").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.Lower
member.summary: Uses lower case (e.g. "some term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.LowerMerged
member.summary: Uses lower case with words merging (e.g. "someterm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.Upper
member.summary: Uses upper case (e.g. "SOME TERM").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.UpperMerged
member.summary: Uses upper case with words merging (e.g. "SOMETERM").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.Camel
member.summary: Uses camel case (e.g. "someTerm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.Pascal
member.summary: Uses pascal case (e.g. "SomeTerm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.Kebab
member.summary: Uses dash ('-') and lower case (e.g. "some-term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.HyphenKebab
member.summary: Uses hyphen ('‐') and lower case (e.g. "some‐term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.PascalKebab
member.summary: Uses dash ('-') and pascal case (e.g. "Some-Term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.PascalHyphenKebab
member.summary: Uses hyphen ('‐') and pascal case (e.g. "Some‐Term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.XKebab
member.summary: Uses dash ('-'), lower case and "x-" prefix (e.g. "x-some-term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermFormat.Snake
member.summary: Uses undersore ('_') and lower case (e.g. "some_term").

member.name: T:Atata.TermMatch
member.summary: Specifies the match approach for the term finding.

member.name: F:Atata.TermMatch.Inherit
member.summary: Uses inherited match or none if missing.
